name: bestbox
short_description:
BestBox is based on Lubuntu. If you like Lubuntu, you will like BestBox even more.

BestBox 12.04 comes with:

+ Gimp2.8
+ Inkscape 4.8
+ NotifyOSD Configuration
+ Shutter
+ PCManFM 1.1.0
+ Tool-Box for fixing common problems.

Interface features:
+ Top panel: window buttons, appmenu, window title, notification area, indicators, shutdown menu.
+ Bottom panel: main Menu, showdesktop, file manager, theme manager, window list, system monitor,
+ UnityDash, HUD
+ Compton the composite manager
+ Chameleon notification
+ Plenty of themes to choose from
*Note: hold Super + Alt then Right-click to work with panels and applets.

Keyboard shortcuts
Alt : HUD
Alt + ` : Expo
Super : Unity Dash
Super + D : Show desktop
Super + arrows : Aero snap
Super + C : Reset GUI
Super + Shift + C : Remove tearings
For more shortcuts, run Obkey.

BestBox's blog bestboxlinux.blogspot.com

Support forum http://sourceforge.net/p/bestbox/discussion/

Contact: pcvl441@gmail.com
